item.title: Go Microservice with Clean Architecture: Coding Style
item.description: Coding style is a relatively boring topic in programming, but it is crucial to have an appropriate coding style to be an effective programmer. There are three components in it: Application layout and folder structure Coding rules or style Naming convention I already talked about application layout in “Go Microservice with Clean Architecture: Application Layout”¹ , so this article covers the rest. Coding rules or style No package level variables.
